channel.title: Talk on R-Ladies NYC
channel.description: Recent content in Talk on R-Ladies NYC

item.title: R in the World of Education
item.description: Join us for our last event of 2017! Erin Grand will speak about how she uses R in the World of Eduction. Visit our Meetup for more details and to RSVP. Date: Tuesday, December 12, 2017 Time: 6:30pm Speaker: Erin Grand Host: AT&T NYC Data Science Research Center

item.title: Tour of R in Peer to Peer Lending
item.description: Catherine Pargeter speaks about how Orchard Platform, a fintech company, uses R. Visit our Meetup for more details and to RSVP. Date: Tuesday, April 18, 2017 Time: 6:30pm Speaker: Catherine Pargeter Host: Orchard Platform

item.title: A Focus on Health
item.description: Elena Colicino and Daniela Vazquez speak about how they use R. Vist our Meetup page for more details and to RSVP. Date: Tuesday, February 21, 2017 Time: 6:30pm Speakers: Elena Colicino and Daniela Vazquez Host: Flatiron Health

item.title: Launching R-Ladies NYC!
item.description: Come meet other local R-Ladies and hear Carissa Shafto speak about her use of R for data science at the Galen College of Nursing. Vist our Meetup page for more details and to RSVP. Date: Monday, November 21, 2016 Time: 6:15pm Speaker: Carissa Shafto Host: RGGI Inc.
